title: BIO-CODES/ISCC-SUM: High-Performance ISCC Generation for Bioimaging Data - OSCARS Project
description: High-performance ISCC (ISO 24138:2024) implementation for bioimaging data integrity and AI-readiness. Includes software and TREEWALK specification for deterministic file system traversal. This work was supported through the Open Science Clusters' Action for Research and Society (OSCARS) European project under grant agreement Nº101129751.
notes:
This software and specifications are part of the BIO-CODES project funded by OSCARS (Open Science Clusters' Action for Research and Society) under European Commission grant agreement Nº101129751.

The repository includes:
- iscc-sum: High-performance ISCC implementation (Rust/Python)
- TREEWALK: Specification for deterministic file system traversal
- SUBTYPE WIDE: Extended ISCC format specification
- Reference implementations for algorithm validation

For more information about the BIO-CODES project, visit: https://oscars-project.eu/projects/bio-codes-enhancing-ai-readiness-bioimaging-data-content-based-identifiers

For technical documentation and usage examples, visit: https://sum.iscc.codes
